findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the block gas limit.

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Modifiable Fees
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to change tax, marketing, car, and liquidity fees.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify the maximum allowed transaction amount.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude from the fee.

findings.title: Owner can change car and marketing addresses.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify car and marketing addresses.

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Enabling After Presale Mode
findings.description: The owner has the capability to enable after presale mode with a transaction amount that includes all fees and swaps to liquidity.

findings.title: Owner Can Enable Presale Mode with 100% Transaction Amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable presale mode with a transaction amount of 100%, without any fees and no swap to liquidity.

findings.title: Owner Can Lock and Unlock
findings.description: The owner can lock and unlock, allowing them to remain as the owner even after renouncing ownership.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw contract BNB balance.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw the entire BNB balance of the contract.

findings.title: Out of gas exception if there will be a long excluded addresses list.
findings.description: The function includeInReward() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.
